getClockDifference

public long getClockDifference()
                        throws java.io.IOException
Estimates the clock difference with this slave.

Returns:
difference in milli-seconds. a positive value indicates that the master is ahead of the slave, and negative value indicates otherwise.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

getClockDifferenceString

public java.lang.String getClockDifferenceString()
Gets the clock difference in HTML string.

getWorkspaceFor

public FilePath getWorkspaceFor(TopLevelItem item)
Description copied from interface: Node
Returns a "workspace" directory for the given TopLevelItem.

Workspace directory is usually used for keeping out the checked out source code, but it can be used for anything.

Specified by:
getWorkspaceFor in interface Node
